data.name: ScooterFlow
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


  • Join the community of almost 5000 ScooterFlow players
  • Interact with other members, view sneak peeks from the developer, share your gameplay clips, share game suggestions, & report bugs to the developer
  • Download mods & community maps


About the Game

The world’s most realistic freestyle scooter game is finally here. Ride the skatepark, hit the streets, boost the mega ramp, fully customize your scooter & throw down all of the real life trick combinations you could dream of within this physics based scooter game. Experience total freedom & utilize your imagination in a world where the possibilities are truly endless. Perform awesome tricks like tailwhips, rotorwhips, turndowns, no handers, bar spins, inverts, deck grabs, supermans, manuals, flips & flairs.

FEATURES

  • Realistic Physics: Simulate real-life riding with the physics system that's designed for you to flow naturally around the skateparks
  • 4 Camera Angles: Choose to ride in first or third person perspectives
  • Scooter Customization: Customize the style & colour of any part of your scooter & choose from a number of real brands!
  • Save System: Save & load your custom-built scooters
  • Character Customization: Easily cycle through 4 different preset clothing customization options with the press of a button
  • Custom Maps: Download & play custom maps created by the community in our Discord


This game requires a controller to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Controller
